title: ONLINE INVESTIGATIONS (2015).epub Gooner
description:
ONLINE INVESTIGATIONS - Adam4Adam, Ashley Madison, Grindr, OKCupid, PlentyOfFish, Tinder and More (2015).epub Gooner

Publisher: CI Publishing; First edition (May 18, 2015)
Publication Date: May 18, 2015
Language: English
ASIN: B00XW9U15K

Do you have the tools you need to investigate online dating applications and services?

Law enforcement agencies across the nation are confronted daily with rape, robbery, extortion, and child exploitation cases that occured through online dating and casual sex 'hook up' websites and services. ONLINE INVESTIGATIONS: Adam4Adam, Ashley Madison, Grindr, OKCupid, PlentyOfFish, Tinder, and More addresses this problem and gives officers the tools they need to investigate and solve these crimes. 

This book details what information each provider collects and retains including pictures, videos, messages, personally identifiable information, financial information, associated social media accounts, and location history for some of the most popular services, including:

Adam4Adam
Ashley Madison
AsianPeopleMeet
BabyBoomerPeopleMeet
BBPeopleMeet
BlackBabyBoomerMeet
BlackChristianPeoplemeet
BlackPeopleMeet

Chemistry.com

OKCupid
OurTime
PetPeopleMeet
PlentyOfFish
RepublicanPeopleMeet
SeniorBlackPeoplemeet

Singlesnet
Tinder


This book contains all the tools needed to investigate cases involving online dating and casual sex sites including:

Search Warrant and Affidavit Templates
Technique for Tracing â€˜Anonymousâ€™ Users Via Email Addresses, Phone Numbers, Email Addresses, Internet Protocol (IP) addresses, Metadata, and Reverse Image Searches
Service of Process Information (including utilizing Mutual Legal Assistance Treaties for foreign companies)
Data Rentention Periods for Deleted or Deactivated Accounts
